name: Dicesora
description:
Flip your die around the level while trying to roll certain numbers on certain spaces. Face more difficult challenges as you leap higher and higher into the sky. Complete all 12 levels in as few moves as possible.

This game was made for the GMTK Game Jam 2022.
The theme for the game jam was "Roll of the Dice".

Thank you for checking out Dicesora! Enjoy!
